alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 4:25PM CDT until May 10 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Cheyenne County in northwestern Kansas... Northeastern Sherman County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 415 PM MDT/515 PM CDT/. * At 324 PM MDT/424 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles south of Bird City, or 15 miles northeast of Goodland, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Social media report of golf ball sized hail 12 northeast of Goodland at 3:15pm. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bird City. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT/1000 PM CDT/ for northwestern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT/1000 PM CDT/ for northwestern Kansas.
